related.meaning: sebuah lukisan; sebuah gambar; sebuah sketsa

lessons.japanese: そのイタリアの古い油絵は一度も公開されなかった。
lessons.indonesian: The old Italian oil painting was never exhibited in public.

lessons.japanese: この油絵は17世紀のものです。
lessons.indonesian: This oil painting dates from the 17th century.

lessons.japanese: 油絵は少し離れて見るとよく見える。
lessons.indonesian: Oil paintings show to advantage at a distance.
She has taken to painting in oils.

lessons.japanese: 彼はその絵を油絵具で描いた。
lessons.indonesian: He painted the picture in oils.

lessons.japanese: そのイタリアの古い油絵は一度も公開されなかった。
lessons.indonesian: The old Italian oil painting was never exhibited in public.

lessons.japanese: この油絵は17世紀のものです。
lessons.indonesian: This oil painting dates from the 17th century.

lessons.japanese: 彼はその絵を油絵具で描いた。

She has taken to painting in oils.

lessons.japanese: 油絵は少し離れて見るとよく見える。
lessons.indonesian: Oil paintings show to advantage at a distance.

lessons.japanese: 芳田氏は山形県に生まれ、日本大学芸術学部油絵科を卒業する。
lessons.indonesian: Mr Yoshida was born in Yamagata prefecture, and graduated from Nihon University College of Art with a degree in oil painting.
